examples.en: He was travelling at a speed of 90 mph.
examples.cn: 他以每小时90英里的速度行进。

examples.en: The car has a top speed of 155 miles per hour.
examples.cn: 这辆汽车的最高时速是155英里。

examples.en: You should lower/reduce your speed as you approach a junction.
examples.cn: 接近交叉路口时应该放慢速度。

examples.en: On a clear, straight road you can gather/pick up speed.
examples.cn: 在空旷笔直的公路上可以加速行驶。

examples.en: He came off the road while driving his car round a bend at high/breakneck speed (= very fast).
examples.cn: 他在弯道上开得飞快，结果冲出了公路。

examples.en: There are speed restrictions (= controls on how fast traffic is allowed to move) on this part of the road.
examples.cn: 这段路是限速的。

examples.en: an electric drill with two speeds (= rates at which it turns)
examples.cn: 有两挡速度的电钻

examples.en: I get a real thrill from speed.
examples.cn: 飞速驾车会让我兴奋不已。

examples.en: He put on a sudden burst of speed.
examples.cn: 他突然加速了。

examples.en: Both cars were travelling at speed (= very fast) when the accident happened.
examples.cn: 事故发生时两辆车的速度都很快。

examples.en: We were surprised at the speed of the response to our enquiry.
examples.cn: 这么快就得到了答复，让我们很惊讶。

examples.en: It was the speed at which it all happened that shocked me.
examples.cn: 令我感到震惊的是整个事情发生得如此之快。

examples.en: She got through her work with speed (= quickly) and efficiency.
examples.cn: 她快速而高效地完成了她的工作。

longDef.en: the rate at which light or sound travels

examples.en: The speed of light is 300 million metres per second.
examples.cn: 光速是每秒钟3亿米。

examples.en: These planes travel at twice the speed of sound.
examples.cn: 这些飞机以两倍音速飞行。

examples.en: a bicycle with ten speeds
examples.cn: 有10挡速度的自行车

examples.en: a ten-speed bicycle
examples.cn: 十速自行车

longDef.en: the rate at which a photographic film absorbs or reacts to light

examples.en: What speed film do I need for taking photographs indoors?
examples.cn: 我在室内拍照片需要感亮度为多少的胶卷？

longDef.en: the length of time for which part of a camera is open to allow light to reach the film when a photograph is being taken

examples.en: a high/low shutter speed
examples.cn: 高／低快门速度

longDef.en:
slang for
amphetamine  (= a drug that makes the mind or body more active)
longDef.cn: 苯丙胺，安非他明（一种兴奋剂）

examples.en: She was on speed at the time.
examples.cn: 她当时服了安非他明。

longDef.en: to (cause to) move, go, or happen fast
longDef.cn: （使）快速移动;（使）快速前行;加速;促进

examples.en: The train sped along at over 120 miles per hour.
examples.cn: 火车以每小时120多英里的速度飞驰。

examples.en: The actress then sped away/off in a waiting car.
examples.cn: 后来女演员钻进了一辆等候的汽车，迅速离开了。

examples.en: We sped down the ski slopes.
examples.cn: 我们飞速滑下滑雪坡。

examples.en: This year is speeding by/past.
examples.cn: 这一年过得特别快。

examples.en: Ambulances sped the injured people (= moved them quickly) away from the scene.
examples.cn: 救护车载着伤员飞速驶离现场。

examples.en: The best thing you can do to speed your recovery (= make it quicker) is to rest.
examples.cn: 尽快让身体康复的最佳方法就是休息。

longDef.en: to be driving faster than you are legally allowed to do

examples.en: He was caught speeding.
examples.cn: 他超速行驶被抓住了。
